111.title: Erina Pendleton/Joestar

choices: More ways for Senorita Pendleton to gain
1112.content:
After defeating Dio, losing his father, and home, an injured Jonathan found solace in an old friend. Erina Pendleton helped aid in Jojo's recuperation, dutifully staying by his side. Once Jonathan was healthy enough to walk, the two would stroll along the country path, enjoying one another's company.

One day the two were taking one of their walks, Erina holding a picnic basket full of food for lunch, "I'm rather looking forward to this picnic."

"Yes it is a fine day for a picnic." Jonathan concurred.

"Though I may have made too much." Erina confessed pointing to the overstuffed basket. "I was never able to eat all the grapes I would pick."

"No worries, my injured body needs more food to properly recover. We should be able to eat it all."

"Oh but I'm such a light eater." admitted the dainty damsel almost embarrassed.

It was at that point that the couple had a 'bizarre' encounter. A man sitting on the fence dressed in a manner unlike the normal attire of the locals, greeted them.

"Ah senore Jostar and the lass at your side is senorita Pendleton." greeted the man before launching into the air.

The man's unexpected launch had surprised the two, particularly Erina who felt a direct sensation in her stomach. The man then struck Jonathan causing him to collapse. The blow which had knocked the air from Jonathan's body had left Erina aghast.

"Jojo! Why he was already hurt you cad." gasped Erina who herself felt the breathe knocked out of her.

"He'll thank me for it." replied the peculiar man.

"My arm it's.. my broken bones..they're mending! The pain is gone." Jojo demonstrating his statements by lifting a rock with the previously shattered arm.

"That's incredible!" Erina exclaimed eating a sandwich from the basket, becoming rather hungry from the excitement.

The man then introduced himself as an Italian man by the name Baron Zeppeli and told Jonathan that he had awakened an energy inside of him called hamon which healed him. Zeppeli also divulged some unsettling news. Dio survived. Jonathan had failed to finish Dio off who would certainly come back for revenge. Zeppeli also informed Jojo of his history with the mask. Jonathan felt so inadequate and obligated to pursue Dio. Erina was especially distraught from Dio's survival causing her to binge on the picnic. The normally ladylike girl tossed aside her restraint as she gobbled up the contents of the basket. Zeppeli told Jojo that he would train him in the art of hamon to defeat Dio and finally destroy that accursed mask.

"Oh my! This calamity is too much to bear!" Erina confessed barely able to stand. "I feel so famished!"

"Fear not Erina for I shall learn this 'hamon' and use it to settle things with Dio once and for all." Jonathan placed a comforting hand on Erina, declaring his resolve.

Jonathan's hand on Erina gave Zeppeli some sight on how potent Jonathan's hamon was. Thanks to his well-trained eye, Zeppeli noticed Erina was ever so slightly thickening. Jojo's hamon was traveling through his hand into the flesh of Erina, killing her metabolism and converting her picnic binge directly into pure fat. This was happening because hamon had a rather peculiar effect on women. Simply put it made them fat. Hamon agitates female stomachs causing them to crave excessive amounts of food, slows down womens' metabolisms, depletes girl's energy, and alters feminine bodies to efficiently store massive deposits of body fat without any health hazards.

"I have found me a champion" Zeppeli thought as he witnessed Erina's dress tighten.
1112.title: Side effects of hamon

choices: Erina eats everything before Jojo finishes
11121.content:
Jonathan practiced various techniques as a faithful Erina watched on, incidentally receiving the effects of hamon. Every time Jojo summoned up a hamon burst, Erina grew hungry and tired, taking a seat and partaking from the food she brought. At first Erina packed small portions and light snacks such as grapes. However to her chagrin she'd always eat it all before Jojo or Zeppeli could partake. This had embarrassed the blonde girl so she bring more high calorie food. However her continued exposure to hamon only increased her appetite rendering her offerings insufficient. Despite her increasing hunger, Erina remained loyal to Jojo, standing by to cheer him on as he mastered hamon with the days quickly passing.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------

A plump Erina was heading to the area were Zeppeli was training Jonathan carrying a huge basket of baked goods. Erina intended to share the food with everyone, however she found herself consuming one after the other. Erina's tongue had developed a deeper appreciation for foods. Food had never tasted so good to the lass before. Food now provided the polite girl with a sensation that was somewhat addictive. Even when full, Erina still craved the tantalizing pleasure that tasting food gave her. Barely out the door and Erina was on her third serving.

"Oh why am I doing this? I made these to eat with Jonathan but I'm helplessly eating them already. I doubt there will be any left too." Erina pouted looking at her loaded basket fearing that it'll be emptied before her love would get any. "And I had such a large lunch too."

Large was an understatement, Erina had feasted upon various trays, meats, and heavily buttered bread. Her ladylike manners and restraint were absent as Erina in such an uncouth manner, shoveled food in her mouth, abandoning utensils and crammed food in her mouth like that of a ill-mannered bumpkin. the other ladies eating around her blush from embarrassment at their companion's vulgarity. Erina wanted to eat small portions and gracefully use utensils but her overwhelming voracity dominated her.

Erina had arrived to see Jojo sparring with Zeppeli. Jonathan was working so hard, giving his all to master hamon and save the world from the dastardly Dio and his wicked ambitions while she slacked off and overate. With a roll in her hand and food in her mouth, Erina waved to Jojo, her sleeves concealing her newly grown arm flab that jiggled. Tired from the walk, Erina found a stone wall and plopped her ass down, still eating the baked goods.
11121.title: Jonathan's training expands Erina

choices: Erina dons a more revealing dress
111211.content:
As Erina sat on the stone fence stuffing her face with baked goods, her newly grown belly roll began to strain her dress. The dress which the blonde lass was wearing was tailored to fit a slim woman. The delicate fabrics weren't designed to containing tightly wrapped fat. An unfamiliar discomfort fell upon Erina as her dress began to hug her, digging into her soft sides. Despite this ominous feeling, Erina reached for more rolls.

Finally Jojo and Zeppeli ceased the strenuous training to mingle with Erina.

"Jojo I brought you some scrumptious rolls. You are working so hard so I figured you could use a nice snack." Erina blushed looking down still finding it hard to look directly at her love.

"Such a kind act. Indeed I have worked up quite the appetite from this vigorous training." Jojo's kind response made Erina blush more.

As Jonathan peered into the basket from which Erina had been eating from, his hamon aura seeped into Erina's body. The hamon then effected Erina's female body and converted the contents of her stomach into fat. A layer of flab was evenly developing on her, straining her dress even more taut. Erina could feel her outfit dig into her expanding flesh causing her to groan.

"Erina is there a problem?" Jojo noticed the blonde girl's anguish.

"Oh it's nothing just a little hunger. I've been so famish as of late." A true statement Erina used attempting to conceal her torment.

Suddenly Erina's dress split at the seams, unveiling a fleshy side of torso.

"GOODNESS!" Erina cried out.

"My word!" Jonathan quickly turned and shielded his vision. Being a gentleman he refused to be improper and violate the purity of a woman by seeing any indecent exposed flesh.

"Oh dear!" Erina quickly covered the tear with her hands only to rip the other side of her dress.

Jonathan's mere presence was causing Erina's body to rapidly convert calories into fat. Erina could feel her belly swell, her legs thicken, her arms soften, her butt widen, and her chest tighten.

"Goodness! I must take my leave!" Erina excused herself only to have her boobs burst from her dress creating ample cleavage before she could run off.

Running was much harder for her with her weight gain. Erina prayed that no one would see her in such a shameful manner. As she lifted the front part of her dress, she panted heavily. Her body wobbled from her urgent movements making her escape all the more difficult. Being a modest woman, Erina wore a rather concealing dress, a dress which now heated her body causing her to sweat.

"Oh my how unpleasant." Erina reacting to her physical exertion.

Erina was never a woman particular of physical activity. Being a proper lady implied that she refrained from indecency preferring calm graceful actions, expected of refined people. Now possessing a more plump anatomy such toils proved more than arduous. To make matters worse, her body now became hungry more easily and more intensely.

Erina had managed her return home, her dress shredded to rags.
111211.title: Erina's dress feels tight

choices: Erina's too fat to watch Jojo train
1112111.content:
Jojo was nearing the end of his hamon training with Zeppeli and Erina ever faithful continued to lend her support. Just her mere presence roused Jojo's spirits. However after tearing through all of her dresses, Erina had obtained much larger ones. These dresses however weren't nearly as conservative as her earlier attire. Her ever expanding bulk demand more breathing room. Erina now sported sleeveless dresses that were low cut. By removing the sleeves Erina's fluffy arms weren't uncomfortably squeezed and her armpits could breath. By modeling low cut dresses, Erina relieved her chest of pressure which had made it hard for the lass to breath. Although more comfortable, Erina felt indecent. Exposing so much flesh was too obscene for a lady of her rank. But her body no longer suited to such high cultured standards.

"Huff huff I wish Jonathan would practice his hamon closer to home." Erina puffed fanning herself as she overheated from her tiring walk.

Now more than twice her size, Erina waddled along the dirt path dressed like a salacious harlot. Her boobs spilled out, her upperarms jiggled, her belly bounced, and her buttocks swayed. Exhibiting so much skin made her feel less dignified especially when onlookers passed by seeing her in such a licentious state. Beads of sweat slide down as she pressed on, no longer enjoying her walks.

"Dear me I'm still hungry."

Erina always carried a big sack of food as she was burdened by a hunger that never ceased. Erina pulled out a large, conveniently wrapped cake.

"My how delicious." Erina licked her lips "I hope this will last me the remainder of this walk."

Erina had reached her destination and took her usual seat. Having attended Jonathan's exercises everyday Erina's weight climbed and her hunger grew unquenchable. She'd watch on, sitting on her exhausted ass, feeding herself fattening foods, sometimes falling asleep out of sheer fatigued. Jonathan had become accustomed to Erina eating everything and leaving no leftovers for him.

"Ugh I hate Japan." grumbled an aged Joseph Jostar. "My only daughter has been married to a Japanese man for over twenty years. Fell in love on the other side of the world and never came home again. That's why I hate the Japanese!" Joseph's wails echoed in the airport.

Joseph rarely got to see his only daughter, having moving to Japan. In fact many years had past since he had last seen his pretty daughter. However fate had sewn the courses of Joseph's and Jotaro's lives together. Joseph traveled to Japan to offer his advice regarding his grandson who was burdened by some peculiar spirit. Joseph already knew that Jotaro was in possession of a stand and knew how to handle it. However there was something Joseph didn't plan on...

"Papa!" Joseph heard a familiar voice. "Papa! Over here papa!"

Joseph scanned the crowd looking for his daughter. Her blonde hair and blue eyes would distinguish her from the sea of Japanese people. Finally a head of blonde hair manifested itself still calling out to him. Holly emerged through the crowd, unveiling an unexpected sight to her father. Joseph became stunned as instead of a slim woman running to him was an obese woman waddling to him, food in hand.

"Holly?" Joseph uttered recognizing his daughter's voice but not the physique.

"Papa I'm so glad you're here!" Holly squealed wrapping her arms around her dad.

"H-Holly is that you?" Joseph asked taken back by his daughter's girth, her flabby arms softly hugging his torso as her huge belly squished against him.

"Of course it is silly."

Joseph couldn't help but stare at his daughter. How could she have gained so much? Why would she let herself go like this? Holly was literally twice her weight, no longer was she the slender daughter Joseph once knew. A great amount of fat had accumulated on her figure spreading everywhere, smothering every bit of her in a thick layer of soft flesh. In her hand was partially eaten food from one of the airport's fast food venues. It looked saturated in fat forming calories. When did she start eating junk like that, she always used to eat so healthy.

"Oh its just a snack, I just get so hungry nowadays." Holly said noticing her father starring at her food. "In fact ever since I moved here my appetite has been so ravenous."

"Oh well uh..."Joseph stuttered struggling to address his daughter's weight.

"Hey let's continue this conversation at a restaurant. I'm starving!" Holly suggested grabbing her father by the hand.

"Oh well uh I guess." Joseph replied being forcibly led by his insisting daughter whose wobbly ass stole his gaze as it swayed left and right.

Then a voice from a speaker came on it sounded like it had a voice changer on "No can do, Ms. Higashikata. You're here to stay."Tomoko kept quiet realizing the true danger. She grunted, though. Then a tube seemingly being carried by nothing came towards Tomoko. But for stand users, they would see a dark figure carrying that tube. The tube was put into Tomoko's mouth but not before she let out one more scream quickly being interrupted by the tube insertion.

"You see here this tube is connected to a fattening and brainwashing chemical. The more you gain weight the more you'll love it and want more." They said almost as if you could a hear smile slowly start to form. "Now, LET THE FEEDING BEGIN!" The tube quickly started pumping the substance into Tomoko's mouth. She could feel her stomach already bloating from it. The chemical surprisingly tasted good. She saw her belly bloating up from it between her eyes. It had the shape of a basketball. But she didn't gain any real weight or feel her mind being taken over...YET.
1243213.title: Knock the victim out! (Force-Feeding Weight Gain)

12432133.content:
"Now this is where the real fun begins!" The tube retracted itself from her mouth. "HELP!!! SOMEONE!! JOSUKE!!" Then all of a sudden she felt her breasts get bigger. Her bra was tightening. Her breasts had already turned into F CUPS. Then she felt herself slowly rising. Realizing the tightness in her skirt and tights meant it was her butt getting bigger. Her tights started ripping. She could hear it so clearly, but before she could cry for help again. Something was blocking her from saying anything. Actually, she liked how big her butt and breasts were getting. Then her belly gurgled and turned soft rather than taut and round like it was before. No! She thought. This must be the mind control! Josuke...papa... All of it was getting drowned out by "GET BIGGER AND FATTER".

Tomoko started fondling herself everywhere she loved her new assets. She then raised her voice and said, "Could I get some more, Pleeaaassse?" "It's already gone into effect, perfect."
12432133.title: She gains weight in belly, butt, and breasts.

Slice after slice went down her throat. The rich cake tasting so delicious. Trish kept eating more and more. Finally, there was no more. Trish held her belly in her hands it was round and anyone could see it. But then…

choices: Packing on the pounds for more versatility
131.content:
So why is she gaining weight? I’ve got two ideas:

1. She gets infected by a virus from an enemy Stand that increases her metabolism.

2. She starts gaining weight out of the belief that it might be able to improve Stone Free by increasing the amount of string the Stand can generate.
131.title: Jolyne Kujo

132.content:
Water Weight - The more accustomed F.F becomes living in the late Atroe's, the more "human" needs she starts to regain. As the months pass, F.F doesn't realize Atroe's native Metabolism has kicked in again...and due to F.F's unique survival needs, starts to "digest" the massive amounts of Water she drinks as "food"! And all the while, innocent little F.F fails to notice her periwinkle jumpsuit getting more snug with each passing day...

Wanting to Fit In - While the rest of the gang were all at Lunch, F.F wonders back to Jolyne's cell, forgetting her precious Big Gulp cup inside. As she looks in every nook & cranny, F.F spots a magazine under Jolyne's bunk. The Magazine was an "US Weekly...though it was a few years out of date, F.F curiously scimmed through the magazine, an article catches her eye. It was by some Dr. Ozz guy, saying that "Obesity is becoming more and more common in America". Really? Was being fat that common among humans? Well, the way F.F saw it, if she wants to integrate on the outside once all this was over, then she's going to have to really pack it on!
132.title: F.F.

133.content:
Make Like a Cow - Due to budget cuts, Green Dolphin State Prison has been forced to serve low-nutrient snake cakes in the Cafeteria and nothing else! Fearing there won't be enough carbs or protein to keep her energy up, Hermes starts to put a Sticker from her Stand, KISS, on each snake cake she eats, making for double to portions. What Hermes doesn't know is that not even her own stomach acid can destroy a KISS Sticker, so the Stickers end up sticking to her own stomach lining...granting her an entirely new Stomach with each cake...stomach after stomach gets added into the spicy Latina Stand user, letting her break down and absorb ever last bit of nutrition...

High Protein Diet - In order to improve her fighting effectiveness without relaying on her Stand, Hermes starts to solely eat meat and only meat, effectively becoming a carnivore. But when the Prison's Gym equipment breaks, Hermes becomes unable to burn any of the excess Protein, which starts to add up.
133.title: Hermes Costello

info.brief_description: The girls of the JJBA manga fatten up.
info.description:
For those who haven't read the manga:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jojo%27s_Bizarre_Adventure
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stand_(JoJo%27s_Bizarre_Adventure)
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Category:JoJo%27s_Bizarre_Adventure_characters

A few guidelines:

1. No male weight gain.

2. No vore, furries or inflation.

3. Try to avoid using things like "One month later..." or "You pick." inside of the actual story.

4. Gain should be involuntary unless you can come up with an interesting plot angle. No "She thinks it would be fun to be fat" or "She gets fat to impress a boy", please.

5. Gain should be gradual and at least a bit realistic. Take some time to describe it, no "She eat 1000 cheezeburgars and is real fat all over."

6. Proper grammar and spelling are important.

7. Make sure you always have at least two choices at the end of each chapter, and don't suddenly end the story.

Anything else is fair game. Keep weight gain the main focus of the story, but if you want to incorporate some other types of expansion/transformation, feel free.
